game.name: Leisure Suit Larry - Wet Dreams Dry Twice

game.shortDescription: No obstacle will keep me away from my beloved, my Faith, not even the wild and untamed islands of Kalau’a. Those lovely island ladies can only distract me for so long as my heart’s compass only points in one direction - Faith!
